bug.description: Previous before <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/pull/1418>#1418</denchmark-link> the network metrics and means how many accumulated bytes of data are transfer through network interface, so Grafana uses <denchmark-link:https://prometheus.io/docs/prometheus/latest/querying/functions/#irate()>irate</denchmark-link> function to extract how many bytes are transferred in that time. But since <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/pull/1418>#1418</denchmark-link> . we have changed the way how network metrics are collected, the meaning of network metrics turned into how many bytes are transferred in that time, so Grafana doesnâ€™t need to use irate function anymore. Should change all related grafana usage.
